content: this easy crochet neck warmer pattern is perfect for wearing as an alternative to a scarf or cowl this winter it fits nicely around the neck and can be tucked under the collar of your winter coat there is not a lot of extra material to deal with as it is designed to keep the chill off the neck without being bulky the pattern includes instructions to make this neckwarmer in sizes small child 3-5 years child 6-10 years adult and adult large **finished sizes** measurements before assembly and without stretching small child neck warmer age 3-5 years 1 5 inches x 17 width child neck warmer age 6-10 years height 2 inches x 18 width adult neck warmer height 3 inches x 20 inches width adult large neck warmer height 3 5 inches x 21 width the edging rounds add an additional 1-inch in height to each neck warmer ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesign/ **youtube ** https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confirmation=1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/oombawkadesign/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter #oombawka @oombawkadesigncrochet #odcmakers © 2021 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
